DESCRIPTION
This mod allows you and your followers to sit anywhere using 4 lesser powers that are added to your spell menu when you load your game.
-Sit cross-legged
-Sit on ledge
-Create cross-legged sitting spot
-Create ledge sitting spot
Sitting spots are removed automatically when you go far away from them to eliminate savegame bloat.
While sitting your health,stamina and magicka regenerate 5% faster. (The heal bonus is only applied if you sat using this mod.)
To use these lesser powers you have to equip one of them in your spell menu and use shout key.


RECOMMENDED MODS
Tell your followers to relax and they will use the sitting spots: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037


CHANGELOG

-crashes to desktop when sitting might be eliminated if you had them.

KNOWN CONFLICTS

(fix it either by adding 'Sit Anywhere.esp' to ASIS mod exclusions or just running the ASIS patch before installing Sit Anywhere.)
-dragonborn: causes the stand up animation to become very fast
